name: Fire And Fear
description:
You are lost in a dark forest. You need to survive until morning, with only a torch. Can you do it?

You are very afraid to be in the forest, especially in the dark. That's why you need to watch your torch. Collect tree branches, and try not to let your torch go out. You have a weak heart. No one knows how a long stay in the terrible darkness can end. Hold out until sunrise to find your way out of the forest.

Movement:

WASD - Move

E - Pick up the branch
